entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the main character's mentor and headmaster of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having been killed by Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who has killed Dumbledore.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a person being questioned by Harry.

entities.name: nicolas flamel
entities.description: Nicolas Flamel is an alchemist and friend of Dumbledore's who has lived for centuries.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story.
